events.message: I received my order last week, but the item is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has marked this case under the Refund category based on the customer’s request for money back.
Assigning the case to agent Maria in the refunds department for further handling and response.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m Maria, and I’ll assist you with your refund request today.
Could you please provide your order number and a brief description of why you want the refund to help us process it quickly?
Sure, my order number is 12345678. I wanted a different color, but the item I got is completely wrong, so I want my money back.
Thank you for the details. I have submitted your refund request, and you should receive a confirmation email shortly. The refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate how fast you handled this and look forward to the refund.
The refund case has been resolved on our side, and you should see the amount credited to your account soon.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since your refund has been received and no further issues reported, we are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting support.
